EmailTemplate.subject: Martell NCF brings you Nervo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>.
<[[ https://www.facebook.com/Martell.sg/?fref=ts]]>
<[[ https://www.facebook.com/Martell.sg/?fref=ts]]>
It’s your lucky day!
You’re going to the biggest party of the year!
Remember to stop by Martell’s Follow The Swift booth to pick up your ticket*.
*You must be at least 21 and non-Muslim to sign up. You will have to show a valid ID and this confirmation eDM at Martell’s Follow the Swift Booth.
<[[https://www.facebook.com/martell]]>
<[[https://www.instagram.com/explore/locations/75798282/]]>
<[[https://www.pinterest.com/martell]]>
<[[https://www.twitter.com/martellcognac]]>
<[[https://www.youtube.com/user/Martell]]>
If you no longer wish to receive these emails you may unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> at any time.
